description: Joe wanted Zakk to get out of bed so they could go do stuff. Zakk had other plans and ambushed Joe while he was getting dressed. It was over in an instant and the pair traded blow jobs like a pair of hungry maniacs. Joe gave up the ass with a quickness and Zakk took it home like a chauffeur. All the way home, behind enemy lines...But this was no 1 way street through pleasureville, though. Joeseph was not going to be left out of the orgasm games and gave Zakk something to remember him by.
title: Hangin Tough
